survey_name: Online Learning Platform Feature Prioritization Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on which features users prioritize in online learning platforms to help improve product development and user satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: What type of courses do you typically take on online learning platforms? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes), include optional text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What type of courses do you typically take on online learning platforms? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you consider most important in an online learning platform? (Rank top 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question type where respondents can drag and drop or select their top 3 choices.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: RANKING (allow selection of top 3 options)

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you consider most important in an online learning platform? (Rank top 3)

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons), include optional text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current features offered by your preferred online learning platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current features offered by your preferred online learning platform?

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your preferred online learning platform to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your preferred online learning platform to others?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with an 'Other' option for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes), include optional text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using online learning platforms?

questions.question_text: How much are you willing to pay per month for a premium online learning platform subscription?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge pricing sensitivity.

script.question_text: How much are you willing to pay per month for a premium online learning platform subscription?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving online learning platforms?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture final thoughts.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions for improving online learning platforms?
